HeroComponentLP.headline: Real-Time Risk Assessment and Incident Reporting
HeroComponentLP.description: Stay informed and in control with a simple, accessible tool for managing risks as they happen. Easily report hazards, follow updates, and get helpful guidance, all from your phone or computer, even when you're offline.

AboutComponentLP.about_description: RiskWise is a tool for uncovering and handling risks. It runs on any device with a browser. You can tap into it even without an internet connection. Users can flag hazards, trace risks, and absorb safety tips. It helps teams respond quickly and stay alert. RiskWise fosters safer spaces by making risk data easy to spread and grasp.

FeaturesComponentLP.risk_reporting_description: Report risks with photos, descriptions, and categories.
FeaturesComponentLP.admin_dashboard_description: Manage and monitor reports with CRUD capabilities.
FeaturesComponentLP.real_time_alerts_description: Receive push notifications for critical updates.
FeaturesComponentLP.incident_timeline_description: Visualize incidents over time for better storytelling.
FeaturesComponentLP.geolocation_description: Capture and display location data for each report.

DownloadSectionLP.download_subtext: Available on all major platforms. Get the app and start improving safety today.

HeroSectionAP.subtext: Empowering the Pampanga State University community to identify, report, and respond to campus risks anytime, anywhere.

MissionSectionAP.mission_text: At RISKWISE, we believe every campus deserves to be a safe, responsive, and well-informed environment.
MissionSectionAP.purpose_text: We aim to eliminate delays in hazard detection and reporting by offering a seamless, mobile-ready tool that empowers students, faculty, and administrators to take action quickly and confidently.
MissionSectionAP.commitment_text: With a strong focus on usability, data security, and system reliability, we're committed to building a culture of safety through technology-driven solutions.

RiskWiseASA.safety_text: A commitment to proactive incident response
RiskWiseASA.accountability_text: Real-time visibility and transparency for better decisions

TimelineAP.timeline_text: RISKWISE was born from a university-led initiative to modernize risk reporting at Pampanga State University. Recognizing the limitations of paper-based systems, our team of students, faculty advisors, and developers collaborated to build a digital-first solution.
